messages.title: Safer Streets
messages.content: With more police community support officers we've got safer streets. We will continue the fight against crime and anti-social behaviour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Providing co-operative solutions to people's needs and the challenges our society faces.
Ensuring that you have a say in the future of the Princess Royal Hospital by becoming a member of the Foundation Trust.
Securing growth and investment in the Wrekin, investing in the local workforce and helping people into work and reducing debt.
Providing excellent services for senior citizens.
Offering a job, work-focused training or a place on an apprenticeship track for the long term unemployed. Also looking for ways to extend Jobseeker's Allowance.

issues.economy: With greater investment in the economy we'll get more jobs for everyone. We will secure the recovery not put it at risk.
issues.education: We will continue to invest in schools, nurseries and Sure Start to give our young people the best chance in life.

leaflet.personalStatement: As the Labour and Co-operative Party candidate I am committed to values of self-help, self responsibility, equality, honesty, openness and caring for others. I will work hard to build a future fair for all.

endorsements.endorsement: Labour's been very good to us and given us a fairer society. As senior citizens we've been well looked after. We're backing Paul to get a stronger voice for The Wrekin in Westminster.
